CheckType: Software and Configuration Checks/Kubernetes Best Practices
Description: Ensure memory requests are set for containers to enable proper scheduling and resource guarantees.
Risk: Missing memory requests can lead to scheduling and resource contention issues.

Code.NativeIaC:
# Example: set memory requests in container resources
resources:
  requests:
    memory: "128Mi"
Code.Other: 1. Edit the Pod/Deployment manifest and set `resources.requests.memory` for each container.

Recommendation.Text: Define memory requests to enable proper scheduling and resource guarantees.

Notes: Requests should be tuned per workload and cluster capacity.
